Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Alissa: Isn't this view wonderful, love?...$l"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/speak Alissa "All my life, I never thought that I could be as confident and happy as I am right now...$l#$b#You don't know how much you've made my life as beautiful, or even more, as this view...$h"/pause 500/faceDirection Alissa 3/pause 300/speak Alissa "I'm happy and contented, @...$l#$b#Thank you...$l#$b#I love you...$l
Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Corine: Hey... I didn't expect you to find me here.$l"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/emote farmer 28/faceDirection Corine 3/emote Corine 20/speak Corine "Hey, no... I wanted you to find me.$l"/emote farmer 20/speak Corine "A lot of stuff has happened in my life.#$b#But whatever and however those events affected my life, All I know is they led me to you.$h"/faceDirection Corine 0/emote Corine 60/speak Corine "...and...$l"/faceDirection Corine 3/pause 300/speak Corine "I wouldn't want it any other way...$l
Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Maddie: faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection Madde 3/pause 300/speak Maddie "What brings you here babe? Miss me that much?$6#$b#Just kidding, come over here you!$h"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Maddie 0/pause 500/speak Maddie "The view’s stunning, isn’t it? But I’m sure it doesn’t hold a torch to how beautiful you've made my life...$6"/faceDirection Maddie 3/faceDirection farmer 1/emote farmer 20/pause 500/faceDirection Maddie 0/speak Maddie "On a more serious note, I was thinking about the years that have gone by.#$b#We grew so much, who would’ve thought you’d break the ice queen huh?$h#$b#Okay, I’d like to tell you something and this’ll be a one time thing only okay?$l"/faceDirection Maddie 3/pause 300/speak Maddie "I know I’m not that showy, nor am I clingy. But I’d just like to tell you that I’m very grateful to have you in my life.$l#$b#Life would be drab without you in it, and with you, I feel content.$l#$b#I love you so much, @!
Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Ysabelle: The view’s breathtaking isn’t it?$h"/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection Ysabelle 3/pause 300/speak Ysabelle "I’m undeniably lucky to have you here with me, love.$l"/emote farmer 20/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Ysabelle 0/speak Ysabelle "Before I met you, I wasn’t really true to myself...$6#$b#I’d just like to thank you for being patient with me.$l"/faceDirection Ysabelle 3/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 300/speak Ysabelle "You made me see that it’s never too late for your dreams. Without you, I wouldn’t be who I am now.$l#$b#Thank you for everything, love.$h#$b#You’ll always be my greatest blessing.$l
